body_html:
@Abhipray @petewarden FYI I have recently begun work on this. There are a couple of outstanding tasks:

  • Add tests for the audio_ops.py
  • Add tests cases for multi-channel inputs.
  • Determine why AudioSpectrogramOp fails with Spectrogram size calculation failed for multi-channel inputs.
body_text:
@Abhipray @petewarden FYI I have recently begun work on this. There are a couple of outstanding tasks:

Add tests for the audio_ops.py
Add tests cases for multi-channel inputs.
Determine why AudioSpectrogramOp fails with Spectrogram size calculation failed for multi-channel inputs.
body:
@Abhipray @petewarden FYI I have recently [begun](../compare/master...andykernahan:wav-op-fixes) work on this. There are a couple of outstanding tasks:
* Add tests for the `audio_ops.py`
* Add tests cases for multi-channel inputs.
* Determine why [`AudioSpectrogramOp`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/spectrogram_op.cc) fails with `Spectrogram size calculation failed` for multi-channel inputs.
